name: Mumshad Mannambeth
tagline: Kubernetes educator, founder of KodeKloud, revolutionizing hands-on DevOps training
bio: Mumshad Mannambeth is the founder and CEO of KodeKloud, a Certified Kubernetes Training Partner. He has revolutionized online learning in DevOps and Kubernetes, teaching over 600,000 students worldwide with his hands-on, interactive approach to complex cloud-native concepts.
